content.desc: Malaysia is in the final of the AFF Suzuki Cup! Harimau Malaya, led by coach Tan Cheng Hoe, fought back to hold Thailand to a 2-2 draw in a pulsating affair at the Rajamangala Stadium in Bangkok on Dec 5 night. Malaysia were held 0-0 at the National Stadium in Bukit Jalil on Dec 1.
